name: UNNotificationResponse
desc: The user’s response to an actionable notification.

items.name: var actionIdentifier: String
items.desc: The identifier string of the action that the user selected.

items.name: var notification: UNNotification
items.desc: The notification to which the user responded.

items.name: var targetScene: UIScene?
items.desc: The scene where the system reflects the user’s response to a notification.

items.name: let UNNotificationDefaultActionIdentifier: String
items.desc: An action that indicates the user opened the app from the notification interface.

items.name: let UNNotificationDismissActionIdentifier: String
items.desc: The action that indicates the user explicitly dismissed the notification interface.
